```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(tidytuesdayR)
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tt_load(2020, week = 28)

coffee_ratings <- tuesdata$coffee_ratings %>% 
  select(-lot_number)
```

```{r}
coffee_ratings %>% 
  summarise(across(everything(),~ mean(!is.na(.)))) %>% 
  gather() %>% 
  View()
```
